readme:
# atom-email-snippets package Snippets for responsive email creation. Created from this post by Kevin Mandeville.

Snippets Available

  • es-html5
  • es-xhtml
  • es-meta
  • es-template
  • es-table
  • es-button-vml
  • es-button-padding
  • es-button-border
  • es-button-padding-border
  • es-image
  • es-link
  • es-hidden-preheader-text
  • es-media-ipad-1-2
  • es-media-ipad-3-4
  • es-media-iphone-2-3
  • es-media-iphone-4-6-zoom
  • es-media-iphone-6-std-6-plus-zoom
  • es-media-iphone-6-std
  • es-media-galaxy-4-5
  • es-media-iphone-4-6-zoom
  • es-media-webkit
  • es-media-yahoo
  • es-if-word
  • es-if-outlook
  • es-hack-android-center
  • es-hack-ios-remove-blue-link
  • es-hack-gmail-selector
